methods.getReader:
Get a deserializing supplier for the supplied item class and input.

Note: Java generics information - <ITEM_TYPE>

:param itemClass: (java.lang.Class<ITEM_TYPE>) - The item class
:param in: (java.io.ObjectInput) - The input
:return: (io.deephaven.tuple.serialization.SerializationUtils.Reader<ITEM_TYPE>) A new deserializing supplier
methods.getWriter:
Get a serializing consumer for the supplied item class and output.

Note: Java generics information - <ITEM_TYPE>

:param itemClass: (java.lang.Class<ITEM_TYPE>) - The item class
:param out: (java.io.ObjectOutput) - The output
:return: (io.deephaven.tuple.serialization.SerializationUtils.Writer<ITEM_TYPE>) A new serializing consumer

text: Utility class for faster type-specific Object serialization and deserialization.
